response.overview: After receiving no word from his best friend who vanished during a camping trip, Stefan sets out alone into the dense, isolated forest where the disappearance occurred. As he pushes deeper into eerie wilderness, strange signs begin to surface like unsettling noises. Eventually, Stefan stumbles upon a building hidden in the woods, decrepit and shrouded in silence. Driven by desperation and guilt, he enters, unaware that the structure holds more than the answers, it holds something watching. As Stefan uncovers the chilling truth, he must face the horrors within and the haunting possibility that his friend might not want to be found.
response.title: Mystery
